org.jgrapes.io.util.AbstractBufferWriter

Package
Description
org.jgrapes.io.util
Utility classes, mainly for adapted buffers to specific needs.

  • Uses of AbstractBufferWriter in org.jgrapes.io.util

    Subclasses of AbstractBufferWriter in org.jgrapes.io.util
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ByteBufferWriter
    An Writer that encodes the data written to it and stores it in a ByteBuffer obtained from a queue.
    class 
    CharBufferWriter
    An Writer that is backed by CharBuffers obtained from a queue.
    Methods in org.jgrapes.io.util that return AbstractBufferWriter
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    protected AbstractBufferWriter<B>
    AbstractBufferWriter.sendInputEvents()
    Causes the data to be fired as Input events rather than the usual Output events.
    AbstractBufferWriter<B>
    AbstractBufferWriter.setEventAssociations(Map<Object,Object> associations)
    Configure associations that are applied to the generated Output events, see Event.setAssociated(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Object).
    AbstractBufferWriter<B>
    AbstractBufferWriter.suppressClose()
    Suppresses sending of a close event when the stream is closed.
    AbstractBufferWriter<B>
    AbstractBufferWriter.suppressEndOfRecord()
    Suppresses setting the end of record flag when the stream is flushed or closed.
